Abbreviated from the idiom of {{zh-l|完璧歸趙|returning the jade intact to the {{w|State of Zhao}}}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=wánbì
|c=jyun4 bik1
|cat=n,a
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|literally}} [[intact]] [[jade]]; [[perfect]] jade
# {{lb|zh|figuratively}} [[perfect]] person or object; [[perfection]]
# {{lb|zh|figuratively}} [[virgin]]

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# {{lb|zh|to return something}} [[intact]]; in good [[condition]]; [[complete]]
# [[flawless]]; [[perfect]]

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かん|へき|k2=ぺき|yomi=on|r=y}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かんぺき}} {{m|ltc|完璧|tr=hwan pjiek}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|完璧|tr=wánbì}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|か|んぺき}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kã̠mpe̞ki]}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|完壁}} {{qualifier|commonly considered a typo}}
* {{ja-l|完ぺき}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|decl=na|かんぺき|hhira=くわんぺき}}

# [[perfect]], [[infallible]], [[complete]]

====Usage notes====
'''{{lang|ja|完壁}}''' is a common misspelling for {{m|ja|完璧|tr=kanpeki||perfect, perfection}} in which the character {{l|ja|璧||jewel|tr=heki|pos={{l|ja|辟}} + {{l|ja|玉}}}} has been replaced with {{l|ja|壁||wall|tr=heki|pos={{l|ja|辟}} + {{l|ja|土}}}}.

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|完璧|かんぺき|kanpeki}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-l|完全|かんぜん|kanzen}}
* {{ja-l|無欠|むけつ|muketsu}}
* {{ja-l|無謬|むびゅう|mubyū}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かんぺき|hhira=くわんぺき}}

# [[perfection]], [[infallibility]], [[completeness]]
